ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class ElasticClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.ElasticClient

  • public class ElasticClient
extends java.lang.Object
    ElasticClient exposes key elasticsearch functionality through the RemoteObject.
    See Also:
    RemoteClient, RemoteObject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ElasticClient(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String index)
      creates an ElasticClient based on a url and index

                                            T instance)
        upload an new RemoteObject to the ElasticSearch server. giving it a new id.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type of the object
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the object we are uplaoding.
        instance - the object we are uploading
        Returns:
        the object, with it's correct id.
